body: The change we made in Firefox's CI was universally made to all Docker workers in Mozilla's TaskCluster deployment. (The change was made at the AMI layer and all workers were updated to the latest AMI.) If Normandy's CI is using a worker defined at https://tools.taskcluster.net/aws-provisioner/, it is likely not using AUFS any more.
